Jordan Discovery | Innovative Travel | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Jordan Discovery 8 days | Amman roundtrip Embark on an unforgettable 8-day expedition through Jordan, a realm where the tapestry of history and natural marvels intertwine seamlessly. Kickstart your voyage with a comprehensive tour of Amman, a bustling city steeped in centuries of captivating history. Delve into the extraordinary experience of the Dead Sea, where the buoyant, mineral-rich waters offer a truly unique sensation. Follow in the footsteps of ancient civilizations as you traverse the Jordan Valley, tracing the paths of bygone eras. Transport yourself back in time with explorations of Jerash, a Greco-Roman city adorned with remarkable ruins. Unravel the intriguing history of Ajloun and explore historic landmarks like Madaba, Mt Nebo, and Kerak. Prepare to be mesmerized by the breathtaking beauty of Petra, a rose-red wonder etched into the desert landscape. Finally, immerse yourself in the captivating vistas of the Wadi Rum Desert, where towering sandstone formations and endless dunes create an enchanting backdrop for your journey.
